article_metadata.title: Preservationists’ victory in Bay Harbor Islands, Surfside, unleashes political battle | Miami Herald

og.description: A string of unexpected victories by preservationists seeking to save mid-century modern residential buildings in the small waterfront towns of Bay Harbor Islands and Surfside has prompted a legal and political backlash amid feuds between residents.
